pages.text: The Puller has filtering-capabilities. It has no GUI, so read this chapter to learn more about it!

pages.title: Puller
pages.text: The Puller can move items from one spot to another. Notice the red block on top: items will be moved towards that direction.

To enable filtering-functions, Right-click on the Puller. A GUI with 9 fields will open.$(br)If you leave it empty, everything will be pulled.$(br)If you put in items, only those items will be pulled (whitelist).
The amount of one itemstack is not doing anything at the moment. In a future-update it will have functionality.
